sentences.en: A combination of lignin and cellulose that strengthens woody plant cells.
sentences.cn: 木质纤维素木质纤维素和纤维素的组合物,可强化木质植物的细胞.

sentences.en: Care must be taken when trimming around woody plants like shrubs and trees.
sentences.cn: 修剪灌木和乔木这样的木本植物时必须小心。

sentences.en: Cellulose is a woody material found in all plants.
sentences.cn: 纤维素是在所有植物中发现的一种木质东西.

sentences.en: How did Buzz and Woody get into Pizza Planet?
sentences.cn: 巴斯荷伍迪是怎样进入“比萨天堂”的?

sentences.en: Invading woody vegetation, especially of the same species, should be controlled periodically to prevent confusion.
sentences.cn: 入侵的木本植物, 特别是同一种类的, 应当定期地除去,以防止混杂.

sentences.en: Stored in the oak barrel, which make the wine has woody flavour.
sentences.cn: 在橡木桶中珍藏, 果香中透出丝丝木香.

sentences.en: The clustered houses of the village peeped out from the woody hollow below.
sentences.cn: 村庄里团团簇簇的房屋,从林木葱笼的凹地中探出头来.

sentences.en: The roots of woody plants grow deep.
sentences.cn: 木本植物的根茎长得很深.
这是个树木繁茂的山谷.

sentences.en: This oil has a lovely woody fragrance.
sentences.cn: 这种精油散发着怡人的木香。

sentences.en: Tree - fern n. large fern with an upright woody stem.
sentences.cn: 桫椤(高大的蕨类植物,茎部挺直).

sentences.en: Trim any tough or woody stalks from the asparagus.
sentences.cn: 剪掉芦笋上粗硬或老掉的梗子。

sentences.en: Who helped Buzz and Woody out of Sid's home?
sentences.cn: 谁帮助巴斯荷伍迪离开了西德的家?

sentences.en: Who picked Buzz and Woody up from the prize machine?
sentences.cn: 是谁把伍迪荷巴斯从奖品机里夹了出来?

sentences.en: Woody Woodpecker first appears, in the film Knock Knock.
sentences.cn: 1940年,伍德·伍德派克首次亮相于电影“敲门人”中.

words.tran_cn: 木质的；多树木的；木头似的

trans.tran_cn: 木质的，木本的，似木的，多木林的
trans.tran_en: a woody plant has a stem like wood
